title: My Development
subtitle: As lead engineer on projects like Qardeal, my workflow focuses on end-to-end system architecture, core backend development, and cross-team leadership. Each stage ensures scalable, maintainable solutions.

discovery.title: Research & Discovery
discovery.description: Lead technical discovery sessions, analyze business requirements, and assess system architecture needs. Define technical feasibility and success metrics.

architecture.title: Architecture & Planning
architecture.description: Lead core architecture design, select optimal technology stack, and establish backend infrastructure patterns. Plan development phases and deployment strategy.

implementation.title: Development & Integration
implementation.description: Lead core backend development, coordinate full-stack implementation, and ensure code quality through reviews. Maintain clean architecture across all layers.

delivery.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
delivery.description: Lead testing strategy implementation, conduct performance optimization, and ensure system reliability through comprehensive QA processes.

monitoring.title: Deployment & Monitoring
monitoring.description: Lead production deployment strategy, configure monitoring systems, and oversee post-launch performance optimization and system improvements.

cta.title: Ready to start your project?
cta.description: Let's discuss your needs and create a custom plan that delivers real value to your business.
